titleInfo.title: 'A Few Words of Welcome, Koweit.' Photographer: Unknown

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:136 x 200 mmCondition:The print is in good condition, though the mounting paper is heavily foxed and crumbling.Foliation:‘23’Process:Silver gelatin

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterView of a group of Kuwaiti men on the shore at Koweit [Kuwait], greeting Lord Curzon’s party as they land. A carriage drawn by two horses stands waiting right of centre. In the background the waters of the Persian Gulf and some small boats are visible.InscriptionsInk, below image: 'A Few Words of Welcome, Koweit.'Pencil, lower right, alongside image: ‘23’
